name: Pastry Lovers
detailed_description:
Pastry Lovers is an adventure simulation game that sets in a fantastic Pastry Kingdom. Sakura, the main character, grows into a pastry master and gains romantic love.

  • Up to four main story lines and more than ten endings, experience different life
  • Explore the mystery of who you are and your secret backgrounds
  • Romantic different handsome guys of your choices
  • Interactive choices that change the results
  • Coffee and pastry stores simulation
  • Develop your character and unlock multiple recipes with fairy partners
  • Get special items from lottery system
Pastry Lovers is a masterpiece with lots of fantastic ideas. Sakura finally turns into a successful pastry chef after went through many difficulties. It is a work that has remarkable thoughts and positive ideas. You’ll learn a lot from the growth of Sakura.
What are you waiting for? Come and join Sakura to explore the pastry world!
